entries.title: The ransomware problem won't get better until we change one thing
entries.description: Targets of ransomware rarely publicly acknowledge attacks. More openness would help everyone.

entries.title: The 5 best Halloween animatronics of 2022
entries.description: The best Halloween animatronics are the ultimate tool for a spooky atmosphere. With motion sensors, touch activation, remote starters, and LED lights, your costume party guests and trick-or-treaters will be in for a fun night of fright.

entries.title: Best Bluetooth trackers of 2022: AirTag and alternatives
entries.description: ZDNET thinks the AirTag is the best Bluetooth tracker available due to its Precision Finding capabilities, replaceable battery, and the dependability of the Find My Network. But there are solid alternatives if you prefer to be outside of Apple's ecosystem.

entries.title: A Microsoft user raged against Outlook. Microsoft lovers fought back
entries.description: When you think Microsoft's email service is terrible, maybe you forget that it could be worse.

entries.title: I just spent a week with a robot cat and my life will never be the same
entries.description: The metaCat is AI-powered. It's the perfect companion. It's lifelike. But what else is it?

entries.title: The 5 best PS5 games of 2022
entries.description: Looking for a new PS5 game to play? Ghost of Tsushima is a great choice. The attention to incredible visuals and the 45 hours of story content is what makes this PS5 game one of the best on the market. But we found some others worth playing, too.
